name: Melvin X. LINDSAY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE and Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Lindsay v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Melvin X. LINDSAY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE and Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of March, 2005, the above captioned appeal is quashed for failure to file a brief.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
871 A.2d 790
Melvin X. LINDSAY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE and Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees.
No. 39 EAP 2003.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 30, 2005.
